Package dbAPI

Interface IDatabaseHelper

public interface IDatabaseHelper
An interface that represents a generic database for specific database APIs
It's supposed to link between a specific database type and it's API, and this generic API
Should be implemented for each database type

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int MY_SQL
    A value to be returned by getType() when it's a MySQL database
    static int OTHER
    A value to be returned by getType() if the type isn't one of the constants
    static int SQLITE
    A value to be returned by getType() when it's a SQLite database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()

    Convert DatabaseValue to it's string form in sql statements

    Delete from the specified table where the condition is met

  • Method Details

    • getType

      int getType()
      Get this helper's implementation database type
      Returns:
      A constant value that represents a database type

    • open

      void open()
      Open the database

    • isOpen

      boolean isOpen()
      Check if the database is open
      Returns:
      True if the database is open, otherwise: False

    • create

      void create​(java.lang.String table)
      Create the specified table in the database
      Parameters:
      table - The table to create

    • insert

      void insert​(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String[] columns, java.lang.String[] values)
      Insert specified values in specified columns inside a specified table
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table in the database
      columns - The columns in which to insert the values
      values - The values which to insert

    • update

      void update​(java.lang.String table, IRow row)
      Update a specified table with values from a specified row
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table in the database
      row - The row to take values from

    • update

      void update​(java.lang.String table, IRow row, java.lang.String whereCondition)
      Update a specified table with values from a specified row with a condition
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table in the database
      row - The row to take values from
      whereCondition - the condition in sql format(without 'WHERE')

    • select

      IDatabaseReader select​(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String[] columns)
      Select all the rows from a specified table and read the specified columns
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table in the database
      columns - The columns which to select
      Returns:
      A reader with the selects results

    • select

      IDatabaseReader select​(java.lang.String table, java.lang.String[] columns, java.lang.String whereCondition)
      Select rows in a specified table and read the specified columns where the condition is met
      Parameters:
      table - The name of the table in the database
      columns - The columns which to select
      whereCondition - The condition in sql format(without 'WHERE')
      Returns:
      A reader with the selects results
